home.titleName: A clan of authentic Filipino Eskrima-Kali-Arnis with direct lineage to the original Masters and their old teachings.

footer: GUBA DOCE PARES MEXICO | GUADALAJARA, AGUASCALIENTES, SALTILLO

about.introPage: We are a team with presence in Mexico for more than 6 years, we have different training points, each one led by an outstanding member of our team, get to know them.
about.migelText1: Specializing in Self Defense and Fitness. He is currently located in Austin TX.
about.migelText2: He leads our school in Mexico, also leads the training teams in USA, Ecuador and Colombia.
about.abigailText: The instructor, Abigail, trains in Guadalajara Jal.
about.yasminText: The instructor, Yasmin, trains in Aguascalientes Ags.
about.carlosText: The instructor, Carlos, trains in Aguascalientes Ags.

classes.introPage: Learn from the best, we train at different times and places. We also provide seminars and training, from the general public to security personnel.
classes.joinTitle: WOULD YOU LIKE TO BECOME AN INSTRUCTOR?
classes.joinText: If you would like to be able to give classes, organize your own events, seminars and/or trainings, with certification and official endorsement of the Guba Doce Pares International association. Complete our special course and get certified as an official instructor.
